patthana21.27:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ
patthana21.27:1.1_1: naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.27:1.1_2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.27:2.1: Nahetuṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.27:3.1: Nahetuṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
